description: Martian is a library that allows the embedding of configurationinformation in Python code. Martian can then grok the system anddo the appropriate configuration registrations. One example of a systemthat uses Martian is the system where it originated Grok(httpgrok.ope.org)
longdescription: Martian is a library that allows the embedding of configurationinformation in Python code. Martian can then grok the system anddo the appropriate configuration registrations. One example of a systemthat uses Martian is the system where it originated Grok(httpgrok.ope.org)
